questions.text: Have you felt overwhelmed by tasks or deadlines this week?
Do you struggle to switch off mentally after work or studying?
Do you keep thinking about tasks even when "off time"?
Have you felt like you're running out of time most days?
Did you feel pressure to be productive constantly?
Did you cancel rest or breaks to finish work or study?
Have you felt mental tension without a clear reason?
Did you struggle to maintain focus during work or study sessions?
Do you get distracted easily by your phone or environment?
Did you switch tasks without completing them first?
Did you start working without planning what to do?
Did you struggle to remember what you were doing after interruptions?
Have you felt mentally slow or foggy while studying/working?
Did you find it hard to stay focused for more than 20â€“30 minutes?
Did you often feel unmotivated to start tasks this week?
Did you procrastinate on important tasks?
Did you feel like you achieved less than you could?
Did you miss or push off planned study/work sessions?
Did you feel stuck but didn't know how to move forward?
Did you lack interest in tasks you usually enjoy?
Did you feel bored during tasks more than usual?
Did you sleep less than 6â€“7 hours on most days this week?
Did you stay up late working or studying?
Did you wake up feeling tired or unrefreshed?
Did you think about work/study while trying to sleep?
Did you use screens (PC/phone) right before sleep?
Did you nap because of lack of nighttime sleep?
Did you feel mentally tired during the day?
Have you experienced unusual mood swings this week?
Did you feel more anxious than normal?
Did you feel sad, low, or down without a reason?
Did you feel irritated or frustrated more than usual?
Did you feel disconnected from others?
Did things that normally feel easy feel hard this week?
Did you have trouble enjoying your free time?
Have you spent most of your day in front of screens?
Did you feel mentally tired after screen use?
Did you check your phone even when not needed?
Did social media or apps steal time from studying/work?
Did you feel uncomfortable when away from digital devices?
Did you keep using screens even when tired or in pain?
Did screen time affect your mood negatively?
